comments.body:
(1/2) According to upstream [Makefile](https://github.com/keycloak/keycloak-gatekeeper/blob/d8a5f554db5ac134368a5c1e2bb5c24501a207c0/Makefile#L83-L85) we need to to call `dep ensure` before actually installing the package. 
```suggestion
    - {{ compiler("go") }} >=1.11.3
    - go-dep
```

(1/2) According to upstream [Makefile](https://github.com/keycloak/keycloak-gatekeeper/blob/d8a5f554db5ac134368a5c1e2bb5c24501a207c0/Makefile#L83-L85) we need to to call `dep ensure` before actually installing the package. 
```suggestion
    - dep ensure
    - go install -v .
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@    - pushd {{ pkg_src }}
    - dep ensure
    - go install -v .

requirements:
